title: Fixed issue #27, where keyboard focus to reading/meaning note or user synonym…
message:
Fixed issue #27, where keyboard focus to reading/meaning note or user synonym text box was lost a short duration after clicking.
Solution: Check if textarea or synonym input present in javascript (while info panel open), before calling requestFocus() on the main text box on page scroll/resize.

title: Fixed SQLite leak, etc. (#28)
message:
Fixed SQLite leak, etc. (#28)

* Fixed a crash that happens when pressing Back and entering the main screen; also restricted the API key input to hexadecimal characters

* Updated SettingsActivity to use a more recent version of the activity.

* Shortened JS code, somehow causing the 訓読み kanji text to work properly

* Made it so the back button and onSupportNavigateUp do the same thing, removed unused imports

* Updated SQLite script to stop leaking; shortened WaniKaniKunOn code, updated gradle

* Fixed critical items display

* Improved performance on progress details

Introduced font caching to avoid the repeated creation of the normal and custom fonts. This resolves the visible pause on the progress screen when there are a lot of items in the remaining queue.

* Fixed Critical Items bug

The detail page never had the chance to load the actual details for the selected symbol because the loadData() method always ran before the async request to fetch the data completed.

* Fixed type indicators in Unlocked/Critical items

The item types were incorrectly compared against strings instead of the appropriate enum variants.

* Fix gradle related stuff

* Redesign ItemDetailsActivity

Enable Instant Run while at it, and fix some empty fields not being hidden when item burned...

* fixed battery drain issue with notifications

fixed battery drain issues

also cancel scheduled notifications when disabling notifications in
settings

* fixed battery drain for real time

sorry about that

* removed some test code that I forgot to remove

* "nwa" input into the Japanese IME now outputs んわ instead of ぬぁ

* Modified some IME code to suppress warnings

* Modified the card for available lessons and reviews to work properly with singular amounts ("1 REVIEW" instead of "1 REVIEWS")

* Fixed a crash that happens when pressing Back and entering the main screen; also restricted the API key input to hexadecimal characters

* Updated SettingsActivity to use a more recent version of the activity.

* Shortened JS code, somehow causing the 訓読み kanji text to work properly

* Made it so the back button and onSupportNavigateUp do the same thing, removed unused imports

* Updated SQLite script to stop leaking; shortened WaniKaniKunOn code, updated gradle

title: Put an end to the suffering of ItemDetailsActivity
message:
Put an end to the suffering of ItemDetailsActivity

Rewrite the code of ItemDetailsActivity in order to throw out that old junk of a code. This commit also is like a continuation to the previous one as it modifies the API files too: moves some classes to their own files, implements Serializable for some missed classes... Another thing that changes with this commit is that when starting ItemDetailsActivity, we no longer need to pass many args. Just passing the Item is enough. Depending on what the item is, ItemDetailsActivity will either show data directly off the Item (when item is complete), or fetch a complete item (when item is incomplete. e.g., UnlockItem or CriticalItem.)

title: Incorporate WK Mobile's internal browser and userscripts support
message:
Incorporate WK Mobile's internal browser and userscripts support

This commit brings support for userscripts and fixed issues with the review system caused by the built-in webview.

Userscripts available as of this commit:
- Ignore Button (WaniKani Override)
- Single Button
- WaniKani Improve
- Review Order
- Lesson Order
- Auto Popup
- Mistake Delay

New features:
- No suggestions
- SRS Indicator in reviews
- HW Acceleration in reviews and lessons
- Mute Button
